docs.text: MkLorum For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Technical documentation tools available Dropbox Paper Atlassian REST API Browser (for API use) Tettra (for internal use) GitHub (& GitHub Pages) Apiary (for API use) MarkdownPad (Windows) iA Writer (Mac) Different themes in Mkdocs Custom theme Basic theme Packaging themes Distributing themes Mkdocs syntax MkDocs is a static site generator designed for building documentation websites. Written in the Python programming language.
